name: Car Racer (dronkowitz28)
description:
Welcome to Car Racer Game: By Darius

How to play: the first laser will shoot automatically when u first start the game, just use the letter A on your keyboard to shoot more laser beams at the wall.

If u want the car to reset for any reason simply just let the car hit the wall and it will reset the car to spawn again after 3 seconds.

Thank u for testing out my game if u have any questions please let me know
